title: overwhelmed I have to care for and protect my mother.

thread.content: I am bipolar yet have a teaching degree from a very good college. My mother was diagnosed with ALS while I was in school a decade ago and has been given a second death sentence with all kinds of cancer. My dad abuses my incapacitated mother and I recently just had a miscarriage which I thought was my one shot at happiness and another m. I clean a bar two hrs a day to make some money but am unable to get a good job because I have to care for and protect my mother.
thread.author: Vice1216

thread.content: In other words I am overwhelmed and feel I have nothing to live for....I can't take anymore! No reason to wake up in the morning ur even live. Help me!
thread.author: Vice1216

thread.content: Vice? I just came across this... sure ur mother needs you. Maybe u have no siblings as u mentioned none. A miscarriage may be the way ure held from facing more challenges. so much happens we do not understand, but Prov. 3.5 says Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding... It is said true help comes from the Lord alone, although He uses other people to reach others also. By now have u tried other options... writing, tutoring, even online teaching? Just some ideas.
thread.author: samm00
